paly.previewWarning: Not satisfied with the preview voice? Try voices generated by our lastest AI in export audio.

download.disabledScaleOptions: Some scale options are disabled due to your browser's canvas limitation.
download.disabledScaleOptionsWorkarounds: Possible workarounds include generating the image from svg using this cli tool:
download.shareInfo2: and its link when I share this image.

telemetry.title: Telemetry
telemetry.info: To help improve Rail Map Announcer and keep contributors motivated to enhance the project, anonymous usage data is collected through Google Analytics. This data is used solely for enhancing the user experience and optimizing the tool's functionality and is never shared with third parties.
telemetry.essentialTooltip: Change this global setting in Rail Map Toolkit
telemetry.essentialInfo: Rail Map Announcer collects essential usage data that helps us understand how and when users interact with the tool. Rest assured, no personally identifiable information or data from your projects is ever collected.
telemetry.essentialLink: Click this link to see detailed fields that Google Analytics may collect.
telemetry.additionalInfo: Rail Map Announcer also gathers data on interactions, such as project creation or variants modification, when you input. These additional data is also anonymous and are only used for statistical analysis to help us make the tool better.

audioTask.title: Audio Task
audioTask.desc: We are committed to generating the most natural station announcements. To achieve this, we conducted deep training based on a large number of samples. Experience the highest quality announcements powered by the latest large-scale machine learning models!
audioTask.note1: Please note that currently only Shanghai-style station announcements are available.
audioTask.note2: Due to computational limitations, please be patient after submitting your request - we aim to process all requests within 30 hours.
audioTask.note3: Please download and save your creations promptly, as we only guarantee data storage for 30 days.
audioTask.exampleEN: The terminal of this train is ËéòÂ∫Ñ University. Next station is ‰∫îËßíÂú∫ Railway Station. Doors will open on the right.
audioTask.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support audio playback. Chrome or Firefox is recommended.
audioTask.loginFirst: Please log in first to generate audio with AI.
audioTask.freeInternet1: We believe in a free and open internet. You may also
audioTask.freeInternet3: and use in your preferred audio provider :)

new.content1: This will create a new task from the current project.

new.content3: The actual points used is subject to the server.
new.content4: You may cancel the task before processing to get a full points return.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Rail Map Announcer
welcome.desc: Here, you can create and generate customized line displays and announcements!
welcome.step1: Import your work from the Rail Map Generator (top-right)
welcome.step2: Adjust details like door opening direction
welcome.start: We've prepared a sample project‚Äîclose this window and start exploring! :)
